attributes.action: Mandatory Face Mask in the Offices
attributes.additional_details: If Face Masks are mandatory in the warehouse and for all warehouse workers it should be mandatory for people in the offices. We have warehouse workers working shifts patterns and office people are crossing shifts and they don't have to wear a face mask. They are putting other people at risk if they are across shift 1  and shift 2 and they don't have to wear a face mask. Its not fair to other employees who must do a physical work with the face mask on .
attributes.background: I want Office staff wear a face mask because all warehouse employees must wear a face covering. Office staff crossing shift pattern so they can see people from shift 1 and shift 2 and they do not have to wear a face mask which is wrong and unfair to other warehouse employees.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
